dataList.name: Pallid Noise
dataList.desc:
SP Loss Efficiency +2
If at less than or equal to -45 SP and inflicted with this buff, gain Noise Panic next turn.
Turn End: Reduce this effect by 1

dataList.name: Noise Panic
dataList.desc:
Every Coin this unit flips lands on tails.
Expires next turn

dataList.name: Impurity
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Gain 1 Fragile. If this unit loses a clash, the target loses 2 SP
dataList.summary: Target loses 2 SP if this unit loses the clash

dataList.name: Impurity
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Gain 2 Fragile. If this unit loses a clash, the target loses 5 SP
dataList.summary: Target loses 5 SP if this unit loses the clash

dataList.name: Test of the Big Brother
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Reduce value by 1
While this is active, take double the damage from Skills. Double the amount of Stagger threshold raised from Tremor Burst.
This effect expires when this unit is Staggered.
If this unit isn't Staggered when this effect expires, gain 5 Damage Up at the start of the next turn

dataList.name: Vengeance
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Turn Start: Gain 1 Attack Power Up and 3 Defense Level Down. Gain Damage Up based on the amount of damage taken last turn (1 Damage Up for every 3% of Max HP lost)
dataList.summary: Gain Damage Up based on total damage taken last turn.

dataList.name: Vengeance
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Up and 6 Defense Level Down. Gain Damage Up based on the amount of damage taken last turn
(1 Damage Up for every 3% of Max HP lost)
dataList.summary: Gain Damage Up based on total damage taken last turn.
